original_text: And thou shalt make it an oil of holy ointment, an ointment compound after the art of the apothecary: it shall be an holy anointing oil.
korean_text: 그것으로 거룩한 관유를 만들되 향을 제조하는 법대로 향기름을 만들지니 그것이 거룩한 관유가 될지라

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt make it an oil of holy ointment
an ointment compound after the art of the apothecary
it shall be an holy anointing oil
